nodes.text: Paper-folding was the process of folding paper into decorative or representational forms. The Delta-class T-3c shuttle owed its distinctive silhouette to Design Lead Lamilla Tion's fascination with paper-folding. While detained in a Black Sun base, the Nautolan Ojo practiced paper-folding in his cell.
Comic artist Ruairí Coleman included paper-folded figures in "The Second Chance" as a reference to the 1982 science-fiction movie Blade Runner.
